languages.text: "Потому что вы — посланники Бога-орла, созданные им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущие печати его в своем облике, облаченные в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что вы — посланники Бога-орла, созданные им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущие печати его в своем облике, облаченные в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
languages.original_text: "Потому что вы — посланники Бога-орла, созданные им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущие печати его в своем облике, облаченные в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Heavenly Envoys of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Heavenly Envoys of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Heavenly Envoys of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Heavenly Envoys of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: «Porque sois los Emisarios Celestiales del Dios Águila, creados por Él a partir del fulgor de las estrellas y la oscuridad del cielo nocturno. Los que portan Su sello en su efigie, ataviados con las armaduras descritas en las profecías de nuestros ancestros».
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: «Porque sois los Emisarios Celestiales del Dios Águila, creados por Él a partir del fulgor de las estrellas y la oscuridad del cielo nocturno. Los que portan Su sello en su efigie, ataviados con las armaduras descritas en las profecías de nuestros ancestros».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: “因为你们是鹰神的圣使，是祂从星光与漆黑的夜空中创造出来的。你们脸上带着祂的印记，你们身上穿着我们祖先久远之前所预言的盔甲。”
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: “因为您是鹰神的天使，是祂从星光与漆黑的夜空中创造出来的。您脸上带着祂的印记，您身上穿着我们祖先久远之前所预言的盔甲。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: « Parce que vous êtes les émissaires célestes que l'Aigle-Dieu a créés à partir de la lumière des étoiles et des ténèbres du ciel nocturne. Vous portez Son sceau sur vos personnes, revêtus de l'armure des prophéties de nos ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous êtes les émissaires célestes que l'Aigle-Dieu a créés à partir de la lumière des étoiles et des ténèbres du ciel nocturne. Vous portez Son sceau sur votre personne, revêtus de l'armure des prophéties de nos ancêtres. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: 「あなたは鷲神の天の先駆者であり、星々の輝きと夜空の闇から神によって創造されたもの。父祖の古の予言を鎧として身にまとい、その容貌に神の印章を持つ者なり」
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは鷲神の天の使者であり、星々の輝きと夜空の闇から神によって創造されたもの。父祖の古の予言を鎧として身にまとい、その容貌に神の印章を持つ者なり」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Weil Ihr die Himmels-Herolde Gesandten des Adler-Gottes seid, von ihm aus dem Leuchten der Sterne und der Dunkelheit des Nachthimmels erschaffen. Ihr tragt sein Siegel in Eurem Aussehen, Ihr seid in die Rüstung aus den uralten Prophezeiungen unserer Ahnen gekleidet."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr die himmlischen Gesandten des Adler-Gottes seid, von ihm aus dem Leuchten der Sterne und der Dunkelheit des Nachthimmels erschaffen. Ihr tragt sein Siegel in Eurem Aussehen, Ihr seid in die Rüstung aus den uralten Prophezeiungen unserer Ahnen gekleidet."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Çünkü siz, Kartal Tanrı'nın Gök Müjdecilerisiniz. O sizi yıldızların parıltısı ve gece göğünün karanlığından var etti. Siz ki suretinizde Onun damgasını taşıyansınız, atalarımızın en kadim kehanetlerini zırh gibi kuşanmışsınız."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Heralds of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The ones who carry His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
